backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, tests, courses, payments, OTP handling, and access control with various in-memory maps and query/mutation utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping styling refactor tasks to affected frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and branding updates of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and themes defining redâ€‘blue brand colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing meta tags, sitemap link, and root app mounting point.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap XML listing primary site routes with change frequency and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, authentication via Internet Identity and backend session state, global query configuration, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A memoized footer component showing brand info, social links, navigation shortcuts, and a dynamic copyright section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A memoized header with navigation, branding, authentication controls, and user dropdown logic tied to identity state.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: A modal for mobile OTP login handling OTP send, verification, connection status, and related UI states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A profile completion modal allowing users to submit name, mobile, email, and optional photo upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/SignupModal.tsx: A deprecated signup notice modal directing users to the mobile OTP login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login and logout handling, and initializes AuthClient with persisted identity support.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileAuth.ts: Hook managing mobile OTP-based authentication with retries, Internet Identity integration, and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and session data via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark theme variables, utilities, animations, and UI enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard rendering tabs for managing users, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and Stripe settings with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Page displaying grouped video courses with subject-based accents, loading states, and expandable video lists.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, feature highlights, and navigation buttons based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Displays available mock tests with subject filters and handles initiating purchases via checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a failure message after unsuccessful payment and provides navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success message after completed payment and links to mock tests, courses, and home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and update their profile details, including name, mobile number, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user test results, metrics, and charts summarizing progress and performance.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusPage.tsx: Renders the syllabus list with loading state, subject cards, and topic accordions styled using brand accent utilities.
frontend/src/utils/accents.ts: Provides a simplified red/blue brand accent system with helpers for cards, buttons, tabs, numbered items, and legacy accent mapping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining brand color safelist, theme extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Current project metadata including features, issues, theme simplification goals, and new feature requests.
